name: Pork Normandy
ingredients: pork tenderloin, apples, shallots, mushrooms, apple brandy, chicken broth, cream, thyme, butter, salt, pepper
quantities: 2 lbs pork tenderloin, 2 apples, 6-8 shallots, 10 oz mushrooms, 1/2 cup apple brandy, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 cup cream, 2-3 sprigs thyme, 2 tbsp butter, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Brown 2 lbs pork tenderloin slices in 2 tbsp butter. Remove and set aside.
2. Saut√© 6-8 chopped shallots, 2 sliced apples, and 10 oz sliced mushrooms until soft.
3. Add 1/2 cup apple brandy and deglaze the pan.
4. Add 1 cup chicken broth and 2-3 sprigs thyme, then simmer.
5. Stir in 1 cup cream and return pork to the pan. Cook until pork is cooked through.
6. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.
